title: New from NA server, LFG to play normals.
body:
New to Oceanic from NA server. Based in Asia, the server change added too much ping to play on NA. So, looking for party in normal for IP, new friends and fun. Any rank is OK. Thanks! =)

add Virtuos23

replies.body: I am in the same boat as well, the sever change sucked. Ill add you
